title: Mean people
body: I'm a beginner and I really need help with mean people, I just want to practice riven, and it is not my fault for going against platinum players and smurfs when I'm just trying to do my best getting used to riven combos, in one of my game my jungle started to jump into this gold Jax without telling me and said it was my fault, but I was low like low low, and then he did it 3 more times and by that point Jax came back one shoting me in lane and then my whole team starts insulting me but i never said I was a really good riven, then they told me to uninstall and I'm positive they reported me for giving the Jax 10 kills, the Jax was pretty chill though and if I was in his team I would've honored him, but is there a way to be in like a non smurf que or like make them be quite because being told to uninstall after putting 14 hours in a game makes my blood boil and i really don't want to get banned for practicing a champion.

replies.body:
Get out of sub-30 games and you wont see any more platinum smurfs.

Use practice tool to practice combos, and consider not playing riven when you are totally new, or top lane at all. It is a brutal lane that is usually decided in champ select, and is cut off from most of the gameplay and thus prevents you learning a lot of things. If you dont like having zero control and throwing lane, stay away from top.
I guess I'll try adc but where's practice tool?...and how do you get out of sub 30?

Under the same tab as custom AI games.

your gonna get  super mean and toxic smurfs all through  ur climb  even past 30.  theyw ill always be there and people are just generally super toxic period in this game.  ur best bet is to mute all  before your game even starts.  Smurfs  literally make it hell for  new ppl in this game.  they are a problem  in those low levels and they  really turn people from the game.

Once your account is leveled up past level 30 the amount of smurfs and toxic players goes down dramatically (doesn't disappear, but it's much better).

Also, you can mute players if they are giving you trouble. If they don't have anything nice to say then they aren't worth hearing, they aren't going to suddenly start being nice to you either after you mute them so you're not missing anything.
